Html: when looking at the map it became difficult at times to keep track of the plane that i was following due to the colours of the planes being used, being the same. Therefore would you be able to come up with a colour system that represent different planes or when you click on that plane it is the only plane which you follow.

Thanks for the feedback:
  1. When a plane is followed, it is highlighted (as set on the settings page, default yellow). 
  2. When a plane is filtered, it is highlighted in another color (settings page)
  3. If the filter is applied, only the followed and filtered planes are visible

Options:

  1. If this is not working in your place, we should find out why (bug?, unsupported browser?)
  2. If you mean something different (e.g. the color of the plane icon instead of the background shall change), please elaborate. If you need to email a screenshot or sketch, you can do so (vatgm add online dot ms).
